meanings.definition: Apteryxes: plural form of apteryx, a flightless bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: In the zoo, we saw a group of apteryxes wandering around their enclosure.
meanings.sent2: The apteryxes in the forest were well-camouflaged among the ferns.
meanings.sent3: The apteryxes decided to have a race, but their wings were of no use!
meanings.sent4: Watching the apteryxes move gracefully on the ground was like witnessing a ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: The unique appearance of the apteryxes made them stand out from other birds.
